name: Sri Shiridi Sai Seva Trust
briefDescription: “Manavaseva Madhavaseva”(Service to Humanity is Service to GOD) is the main motto.  God has given us this life.  To have a meaning for our life, it is the right thing  to  serve the  persons in need and the people craving for help in various  aspects of their lives.  The main activities of the Trust would be to extend helping hand to the poor people in areas like education, health, feeding of poor, running of old age ashram and orphans ashram etc.Our programmes : Conducting Vocational Training Courses /Educational Summer and Winter Coaching Camps for the poor students - Established one training centre with 15 Nos. of Computers and giving free coaching in Computer courses like MS Office, Photoshop, Tally accounting etc.,Also,giving coaching in women empowerment courses like Embroidery, Fabric Painting, Tailoring and Maggam Work.Medical Aid / Camps for the poorEye Testing for municipal school children and providing spectacles for the needyCataract surgeries for the old aged poorRunning of 'Ananda Nilayam' - A Home for the Oldaged poor and Orphaned Boys from 2016 at 8th Line, Balaji Nagar, Nagaralu, Amaravathi Road, Guntur.  So far, 10 inmates are living with us.
